document.full_text: at least one person was killed and dozens were wounded in clashes between yemeni protesters and security forces in the capital sanaa and the city of taiz on saturday, medical officials and residents said.
document.title: one dead, dozens hurt in latest yemen unrest
lines_and_colors: at least one person was killed and dozens were wounded in clashes between yemeni protesters and security forces in the capital sanaa and the city of taiz on saturday, medical officials and residents said.
